mapper.select: select count(*) from ORDER_HANG_LIST with(READPAST) where #{nowDate} between HANG_TIME and RELEASE_TIME
mapper.delete: delete from ORDER_HANG_LIST with(READPAST) where REF_NUM = #{refNum} and LONG_DATE = #{longDate}
delete from ORDER_HANG_LIST with(READPAST) where LONG_DATE <= #{longDate}
mapper.select: select distinct top ${pageSize} ohl.REF_NUM, CASE when rob.table_no is not null THEN rob.table_no ELSE robs.TABLE_NO END as table_no from ORDER_HANG_LIST as ohl left join RT_ORDER_BILL rob on rob.bill_no = ohl.ref_num left join rt_order_bill_his robs on robs.bill_no = ohl.ref_num where ohl.REF_NUM not in ( select top ${page * pageSize} oh.REF_NUM from ORDER_HANG_LIST as oh order by oh.HANG_TIME )
